body_html:
OK, but the 1.5G maximum resident set size still does not explain the MemoryError since this happens when there is > 10G of unused memory. Also the error only occurs with python3 and not python2.

Yes, the dataset should be way smaller than a G, but I haven't had a chance to look into fixing it.

body:
OK, but the 1.5G maximum resident set size still does not explain the `MemoryError` since this happens when there is > 10G of unused memory. Also the error only occurs with python3 and not python2.

Yes, the dataset should be way smaller than a G, but I haven't had a chance to look into fixing it.
